gacha_id.name: gacha_id
gacha_id.description: The ID of the gacha pool to rank.

period.name: period
period.description: The time period for the rankings, defaulting to 7 days (e.g., 7d, all).

responses.invalid_period: Invalid period format. Use "all" or a number of days (e.g., "7d").
responses.no_ranking_data: No ranking data found for the specified gacha pool and period.
responses.title: Odog Rankings for {{gachaName}} (Last {{period}})
responses.error_fetching: An error occurred while fetching the rankings.
